website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for older students who are trying to save a little money and yet still get a decent quality set.
pros: Set of 10 pieces includes a sturdy metal compass with an ergonomically-designed head
Good value, and particularly well suited for more advanced students
cons: Protractor and triangles could be larger
Some of these arrived missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Package came nice and in a good condition. The compasses are not good quality. They don't lock in their place and are a bit flimsy. The protractor is very small too. I bought this because of all the good reviews but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this is great for advanced math
customer_reviews.text: If you're an adult buying this for your kid, don't do it. This isn't the old school protractor and compass you're accustomed to... I guess I just expected it to be the same. There are no degrees on the compass instrument, and no hole in the protractor. I'm sure this is great for advanced math. But for a kid, this is a no. Just buy it at the store!
customer_reviews.author: A girl just trying to help

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality compass
customer_reviews.text: The compasses are junk. The one with pencil got bent with little pressure when drawing a circle, the other compass doesn't stay in its place when drawing a circle. I tried tightening the screws on top but didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Better than expected. The case looks like it will take a beating. Its durable and it snaps closed with a tight latch. The pencil sharpener is hard plastic, and well made. The compasses are made of metal and look like they'll last. The ruler, protractor, and triangles are great quality, they bend, and the numbers are easy to read. The protractor and triangles are open. It's a small set, I think the protractor is like 5in. It's just what I wanted. For the price, you can't get better.
customer_reviews.author: Shae

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for purchase if only using for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very small and compact. The pieces are perfect for what I’m using it for, which is CBRN 3 Report plotting around Chemical BOLC (ARMY). UPDATE: minutes after I did my initial 5 star review , the little led broke off of the one I held up in the picture above. There was no way to fix it, so they are sending me another one. So it’s not super durable. It does get the job done. And you have an additional pencil option.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a Stocking Stuffers but item was damaged
customer_reviews.text: We bought multiple sets for a donation to a youth group. At first glance the sets looked great, but when we were packing them up to donate, we noticed that one of the sets had been opened and was missing various parts. Also the actual package was taped whereas the other packages were self closing. It was obvious that this item was damaged and should never have been used to fill an order. As these are being donated we would love to have the vendor send us another set to replace the damaged set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the tools are perfect and I am quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This kit works well - I purchased it for drawing mandalas (in an art pad) and I have used it for other art projects. Although the case is at times a bit hard to close, the tools are perfect and I am quite satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lenoci

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My ruler didn't have inches, only metric system. No one uses cm in America, especially not little kids. No one can even think in cms. What's the difference betweeen 7 cm and 9 cm? Who the heck can tell? There isn't a difference. So, as you see, this was a major life altering issue for us. But mostly, the items were flimsy and the compass kept moving out of place. I should have just purchased one of those old metal ones that I used in the 90's which had been around since the 1940's. Those were dangerous and great.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. he is in high school. The compass with lead, the lead doesn't stay in. I tried the other lead and has the same problem. The other compass doesn't stay when drawing a circle. The eraser is very small, and pencil sharpener is not sharp at all. Then I went to local book store and they had the exact same pack for 3.49$. This is a rip off on so many levels.
customer_reviews.author: Books unlimited

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap and doesn’t work with many pencils
customer_reviews.text: I found that this did not work well with all types of pens/pencils. You have to stick with what it comes with. The plastic was a bit cheap feeling and doesn’t seem like it would last very long. I ended up returning the item. I was hoping to be able to change the pencil to different types when needed but it did not work well and I was afraid the plastic would break too quickly. I prefer a metal style and one that will hold a wide range of sizes. I had a hard time getting the right accuracy
customer_reviews.author: D Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Sent a metric only set, as opposed to the metric/imperial set that I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I figured I couldn't go wrong for the price, and I still feel like the quality is good for the price; BUT, I needed imperial measurements and this is metric only sadly, making it much less useful, borderline useless for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Random Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It was cheap. It feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: There are many products on the market in the same price range and with similar descriptions. This one at least feels cheap. Pros: Variety of rulers and tools. It comes in a box to help keep all the pieces in one place. Cons: The materials are cheap, including the mold in which the pieces fit. The compasses are hard to hold and use accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Ido Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Math piece set and the quality of the items are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Geometry Set!
customer_reviews.text: This little set is a great value for the money. After I bought a plastic compass for my daughter’s Geometry class (and protractor and ruler), she came home to say she needed a metal one. This entire set was little more than the price of many of the metal compasses alone. The fact that my daughter can keep all of her Geometry essentials in the provided plastic pouch, made this a great purchase. We’re almost halfway through the school year, and it’s been really sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I only needed a math compass and happened to find this set on Amazon. It seemed like a good price and had god reviews so I bought it. I received it promptly and have now been using it for several weeks. It is sturdy and you can keep everything in the little box it comes in. I love it! I'm glad I went with this whole set instead of buying just all the items separately.
customer_reviews.author: Alvap

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought . . .
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought it would be (which was bigger), and the compasses are pretty cheap - bent out of the box. If I need some super small tools, though, the protractor, angles and rulers will work, i.e. for drafting on paper no bigger than 8 x 11, or smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Southbend

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I do all sorts of art, and I'm always looking for things to make perfect circles, squares, measure off things, etc. All I need is in this compact, sturdy case...including a pencil sharpener and eraser. Perfect for my art travel kit. I couldn't be happier with the quality. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DeeTee

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good value.
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything we need for our geometry sections in home school, and the parts are fairly sturdy as well. The protractors are very solid and everything seems beautifully made. I love that it comes in a neat case and can be carried around without damage. I also found the price reasonable, compared to similar models (which often came with less).
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha S

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price with very few drawbacks.  All around solid set.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product with a nice carrying case. Excellent value for price. The only issue I encountered is the hole on the protractor is too small for most pens; therefore, you are generally stuck to using a pencil or the lead pre-installed protractor provided.
customer_reviews.author: Reconsct

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've ordered - for a second child. First set has held up great with lots of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Okie Jokie

customer_reviews.title: Great for price...a lot of bang for your buck 🤣
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price☺️ Neat compact and seems like decent quality for what you get and I love That you get a lot. We’ve packed our home and are living with minimal stuff so this is perfect in the meantime and will be perfect after to add to our craft/travel box after we get settled again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok and can be used for kids project but I can’t use it for professional work. It just doesn’t work well and feels like it will fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mtrivedi

customer_reviews.title: Good compass
customer_reviews.text: I only wanted a compass, but I got many other accessories in this kit that are not really necessary or even sturdy. Yet, who cares? The compass is great and easy to use. I am not sure it will last in time, but for the moment I can count on it. I like the fact I can use it with a pencil, a brush and anything else as long as it fits. Price is more than ok and I love the fact it has a case.
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked it's compactness. And it includes all the basic tool that you need for basic drawings. Definitely not for a job site use though since it is so fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is plastic, so it will break easily, but if you keep it in the box when not in use, it'll do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Barreda

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay
customer_reviews.text: It's not terrible compared to the cheap price. It does a good job in terms of measurement and accuracy. But it's not sturdy at all and feels like it can get broken anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjib Kumar Baral

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat collection of very basic stuff for a high school math student or younger student. The carrying case is solid and holds everything nicely. The compass is the only piece I wasn't delighted with, but I also wasn't expecting something like I used way back in my college days. The protractor and angles are clear and easy to use. It's a good collection, but don't expect architect quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product is made of good quality materials and has not broken so far. Works very precise. The box is compact and helps keep all things intact. Great product at great price
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Good Compass set
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good compass set for school, and I was not disappointed with this compass set. The compasses seem to be made of mostly metal, and are good quality. Overall, it was a good buy, and I was not disappointed with the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: Devin W

customer_reviews.title: Great set for school.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my son needed for class. The case makes carrying everything in the set super easy. If I could only get my son to put everything back in the case.
customer_reviews.author: M. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: It does what I needed it to do but dont look for too many bells and whistles.
customer_reviews.text: It did not cost much and is indeed made of metal mostly. It does what I needed it to do but dont look for too many bells and whistles. The protarctor and triangles are MUCH smaller than I anticipated but hey it has a nice case. If you need something technical go with something a bit more expensive. Need something that will do for a school kid this works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought for the second time. My son had it for geometry and said he loved this kit and it was great quality. So now I bought again for my daughter to use in her class.
customer_reviews.author: LIMOM27

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this set to work on some craft stuff for my kid. Overall it works well and served the purpose. Its worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aftab K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Even though this product is not only cheap but also very cheap on quality. It is so flimsy, seems like it will break on very first use. "PLEASE STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT"
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: No compass markings
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit overall, but I was disappointed to find that there were no measurement markings on the compass, which makes it nearly useless for teaching. I ended up buying an old-school one
customer_reviews.author: CandyK

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great set. My only complaint is that the ruler does not display both centimeters and inches.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Purchased this set for kids geometry class. It beats spending almost the same amount on one metal compass. The plastic models both broke on the first use. This way he has a spare and other items he might need for school later on. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: everything i need for my geometry course in a 4 year uni. hated the lid because you had to “force” the latch to lock the lid
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Chan

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and handy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son as an add on to his school supplies. He wasn’t impressed with my efforts until he started using this kit. Now, he loves it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Serene Nalu

customer_reviews.title: Great package
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal. You got everything including a case to keep your stuff organized
customer_reviews.author: Melody Espada

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. I was looking for a compass set ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I was looking for a compass set to use in drawing mandalas. I am more than pleased with this little kit. It came with everything I need to make perfectly symmetrical mandalas. Sometimes I wish that the ruler pieces were a touch bigger, but then it wouldn't have fit into the handy little carrying case. I love love that there is that carrying case. I have a toddler running around so I am very cautious of where the compass itself gets placed because the point in NOT PLAYING SHARP, the case solves that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than shown.
customer_reviews.text: This set is about 1/4 the size shown. The picture clearly say the case is 19" long, but its only about 7". Yeah, the parts work. Compass, protractor, ruler, kinda hard to mess that up. They're just freaking tiny. The protractor is only about 4" long.
customer_reviews.author: The Turners

customer_reviews.title: To sum it up... A in Geometry
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my 15 year old needed without needing to navigate a store.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H

customer_reviews.title: Product different than Amazon photos - no inches on ruler and triangles
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is different than what’s shown in Amazon photos. The ruler and triangles only have centimeters on them, no inches. I attached a photo.
customer_reviews.author: NewNew

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Comes with many great tools! Deff worth the purchase! Very durable, and shipped fast
customer_reviews.author: Nicole  Lechner

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for geometry lessons just wish the compasses were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for geometry lessons just wish the compasses were screw type to hold position better though these are probably the best friction holding ones I've seen
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Was missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like everything is brand new only it is missing the pencil and case of lead refills. There is the spot for them in the case but they are not there. only 8 pcs. Sometimes it is better to just spend more money for quality, buy once cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Compasses and rulers, worth $1!
customer_reviews.text: It is a low quality China product! Compasses are flimsy. Also, the print of ruler was wiped after first use. I am a student and I need it for this semester but I have to buy a better quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for high school geometry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for 10th grade geometry class, intending on an upgrade from the elementary school item because the pencil always wore out. Unfortunately, the metal compass did not work well for geometry and the design prevented drawing circles easily. The rest of the tools in the box were great.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Great compasses
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of compasses. The protracted and triangle are small but work good on small drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best geometry set out there for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Use it for a lot of my prototype drawings. Very trustworthy construction! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Akshay

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: The box was great, but the picture showed a black sharpener. I got a pink sharpener instead. I don't mind it, but others might. The compass is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vrigav Narra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cheap feel. I'll gift this to some kids for christmas, but I was hoping for a sturdier product
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even a buck.
customer_reviews.text: awful piece of junk. spend a few bucks and buy and all metal one. The point on this can't even hold its place.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this geometry set. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected. Quality is quite good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: customer L

customer_reviews.title: Great for my math class
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I was able to get this because I needed it for one of my classes. It was very worth it because the cheaper alternatives are not even near the quality of this one. I’m also glad that I can use my own pencil in this instead of just being limited to one pencil. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SirCapalot

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with the pencil and the case it came in was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Used these to make D&D maps. 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Best kit I've ever bought. They can be a pain to fit back into the case, but otherwise, excellent quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better storage case.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces included in this set are great. The case is nice and compact. The only problem is, the pieces are just set on top of each other and fall out easily as soon as the case is opened.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Geometry set
customer_reviews.text: Lovely geometry set with safety measures that prevent needle prick.
customer_reviews.author: Tomapep

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this package primarily for the compass and protractor, but the components in this set are too cheap to be used more than once without breaking. It got the job done for the project I was working on, but I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon

customer_reviews.title: No imperial system - not good for American school students
customer_reviews.text: This geometry set does not come with imperial system as illustrated and it has metric system only, so it is not good for American students. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Menghui Chen

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect! i went to two stores and could not find anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley paminto

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality . . . very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Compass was advertised as metal, only parts of it are metal. The screw that is meant to hold the pencil is plastic! I've never seen a plastic screw before and I can't imagine that it's going to hold the pencil in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Everything my son needed in one set! Durable materials. Nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Holly T.

customer_reviews.title: The units are in centimeters not inches
customer_reviews.text: overall the set is nice but based on the description and the pictures the expectation was that the ruler, would be in inches rather than centimeters but since it is metric we now must buy another set of rulers.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. My college professor recommended this for one of my math classes. I was amazed at how much you get for your money. It’s a great buy
customer_reviews.author: danielle garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is the case keeps falling apart! You know high school boys, still usable and great!
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Looks even better then in the picture. No complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas savage

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it. He says it works well for school.
customer_reviews.author: DayDreamWishes

customer_reviews.title: It’s not like you have to buy this out of all the other ones in the world, but  it works nice.
customer_reviews.text: It work nice, you can definitely get a use of everything in the kit
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Well made and we'll stocked set. Has everything you need for your geometry class
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for geometry class. Has what you need and spare back-ups
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate product description
customer_reviews.text: This isn't all metal-the compass is but the rest of the set is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: seoulmom

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set. I use it for DIY building projects around the house, as well as for working on my car's suspension
customer_reviews.author: John y.

customer_reviews.title: Spreads apart while using compass!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't fix the compass to a certain setting, so it will spread apart if you're not careful!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Trotter

customer_reviews.title: this kit has everything he needed & for a great price. The quality is better than I imagined ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess with all of the violence in schools in recent times I couldn't find a decent compass for my son's geometry homework. Luckily, this kit has everything he needed & for a great price. The quality is better than I imagined gor the price. What else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: jbird0727

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice little kit. Wish protractor was bigger and compass had guide marks. But great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: M. Huber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this mainly because I like using the rulers for my bullet journal.
customer_reviews.author: Lakshmi Katikala

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product details
customer_reviews.text: RULE IS JUST CENTIMETERS, NO INCHES. THE CASE IS NICE YOU CAN HAVE EVERTHING IN A PLACE.
customer_reviews.author: gio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small kit to keep on top of my desk for everyday use. Surprised at the good quality of these instruments, especially in light of the great price. Excellent value if you have kids taking geometry or for someone who occasionally needs a ruler, compass, and triangle without spending a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It helps my daughter get the job done. She has had no complaints, to date.
customer_reviews.author: KiKi Siggers

customer_reviews.title: Universal Compass
customer_reviews.text: Bought this specifically for the universal compass. It fits all my archival markers (copic, prismacolor, and others) perfectly, and is decent quality - I haven’t had any trouble using it! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CAndrews

customer_reviews.title: i would recommend this kit
customer_reviews.text: purchased this several years ago for my first kid's geometry class. purchased the same kit a month ago for my 2nd kid who is now in geometry. kits come as described and have functioned without issue. i would recommend this kit, and will probably purchase it again when my 3rd kid starts geometry in 4-5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Louie O.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: daughter said the compass was too small and she didn't need all these products.
customer_reviews.author: MC - Texas

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: my 10th grader loves this set. Uses it for his calculus & chem classes.
customer_reviews.author: Fancyelephant

customer_reviews.title: Nice for hobby box
customer_reviews.text: Equipment great for crafts. Storage pack is easy to tuck in your craft box.
customer_reviews.author: Maria RMN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as inexpensive as the one I saw later at Daiso (which had an even smaller protractor, which would have been slightly better for 4th-grade geometry), but excellent for the price. Apparently, you can't buy a small protractor separately these days...
customer_reviews.author: Donald Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny
customer_reviews.text: Double check the size of the instruments before you order. I did not and was very disappointed with the tiny instruments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my geometry class. An excellent price for all these geometry tools
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: I think this is my favorite geometry set
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my favorite geometry set, which says something about it. The fact that I have a favorite geometry set, sadly, says something about me, I think.
customer_reviews.author: givens

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap build, nothing special but everything works as expected. My set contained everything as advertised and it worked pretty well. The compasses could need some tightening now and then but they work well and get the job done nonetheless. The eraser is of fairly good quality too and so is the pencil and the sharpener. The set squares and protractor are standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable. This set is complete with all the tools for Geometry. I love that it comes with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Mateo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for our grandson and he is really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: The Coach

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this from office max but returned it when I found it on amazon plus it had way more items in this deal than the store provided. Came on time and I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set at a good price. Appreciate the storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Donated 6 of these kits to a very poor school located in South Africa. They were thrilled. A nice high quality kit in a good sturdy case - especially for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Maped Geometry Set, 10 piece set includes: 2...
customer_reviews.text: Maped Geometry Set, 10 piece set includes: 2...; great price for quantity and quality of items
customer_reviews.author: oshirenshi

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: the ruler is curse on the sides.How do i draw ?😂
customer_reviews.author: Bem Bem

product_meta.title: Maped Study Geometry 10 Piece Set, Includes 2 Metal Study Compasses, 2 Triangles, 6" Ruler, 4" Protractor, Pencil for Compass, Pencil Sharpener, Eraser, Lead Refill (897010)
product_meta.description: Style:Study Metal 10 Piece KitStudy compass is made of durable metal for years of use! Ergonomically designed for the utmost comfort. Perfect for students of all ages. Sets come in shatterproof case for safe keeping. 10pc set includes: 2 Metal Study Compasses, Eraser, Pencil Sharpener, 4" Protractor, 2 triangles (45° & 30°/60°), Pack of leads, Pencil for compass, 6” Ruler.
feature_bullets: Durable metal compasses will not bend or flex during use
Ergonomically designed compass head is comfortable to hold
Universal Holder Compass work with any standard sized pencil or pen
Compasses draw up to a 10" diameter circle
Rulers, Triangles & Protractor feature a name plate for easy identification along with Inch & Metric graduations
Comes packed in a reusable shatter-proof carrying case
The perfect geometry kit for more advanced students!
10 Piece Geometry Set includes: 2 Metal Study Compasses, 2 Triangles (45° & 30°/60°), 6" Ruler, 4" Protractor, Pencil for Compass, Pencil Sharpener, Eraser, & Lead Refill
